title: 'Foxcatcher': A Bloated True-Crime Story Based On Wealthy Heir John du Pont
teaser: The film is based on du Pont's fraught relationship with two Olympic wrestlers. Wealth isn't enough â€” his identity hinges on winning. It's a fascinating case study, but as drama, it's one sick joke.
